chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Your Response:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

Your Response:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
None

Goal:
forall (d : preDTA) (a a0 : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance_co d a a0 t -> preDTA_ref_ok d -> reconnaissance_co (predta_kill_non_coacc d a0) a a0 t

Premises:
Inductive reconnaissance_co : preDTA -> ad -> ad -> term -> Prop := rec_co_dta : forall (d : preDTA) (a b : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait_co d ladj b t -> coacc d b a -> reconnaissance_co d a b t with state_reconnait_co : preDTA -> state -> ad -> term -> Prop := rec_co_st : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c b : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait_co d l b tl -> state_reconnait_co d s b (app c tl) with liste_reconnait_co : preDTA -> prec_list -> ad -> term
ad = N : Set
preDTA = Map state : Set
preDTA_ref_ok = fun d : preDTA => forall (a : ad) (s : state) (c : ad) (pl : prec_list) (b : ad), MapGet state d a = Some s -> MapGet prec_list s c = Some pl -> prec_occur pl b -> exists s0 : state, MapGet state d b = Some s0 : preDTA -> Prop
predta_kill_non_coacc = fun (d : preDTA) (a : ad) => non_coacc_kill d (predta_coacc_states d a) : preDTA -> ad -> preDTA
Inductive term : Set := app : ad -> term_list -> term with term_list : Set := tnil : term_list | tcons : term -> term_list -> term_list
FSetPositive.PositiveSet.E.t = positive : Set
rec_co_5 : forall (d : preDTA) (a a0 a1 : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance_co d a a1 t -> coacc d a0 a1 -> reconnaissance_co d a a0 t
rec_co_rec : forall (d : preDTA) (a a0 : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance_co d a a0 t -> reconnaissance d a t

predta_kill_non_coacc_3 : forall (d : preDTA) (a0 a1 : ad), preDTA_ref_ok d -> coacc d a0 a1 -> coacc (predta_kill_non_coacc d a0) a0 a1
reconnaissance_co_ind : forall P : preDTA -> ad -> ad -> term -> Prop, (forall (d : preDTA) (a b : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait_co d ladj b t -> coacc d b a -> P d a b t) -> forall (p : preDTA) (a a0 : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance_co p a a0 t -> P p a a0 t
rec_co : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), preDTA_ref_ok d -> reconnaissance d a t -> reconnaissance_co d a a t
predta_kill_non_coacc_def_0 = fun (d : preDTA) (a0 a1 : ad) => preDTA_ref_ok d -> coacc d a0 a1 -> coacc (predta_kill_non_coacc d a0) a0 a1 : preDTA -> ad -> ad -> Prop
predta_kill_non_coacc_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (a a0 : ad) (s : state), preDTA_ref_ok d -> MapGet state d a0 = Some s /\ coacc d a a0 < -> MapGet state (predta_kill_non_coacc d a) a0 = Some s
rec_co_9 : forall (d : preDTA) (tl : term_list) (a : ad) (l : prec_list), liste_reconnait d l tl -> (forall u : term, term_list_occur u tl -> forall (d0 : preDTA) (a0 : ad), preDTA_ref_ok d0 -> reconnaissance d0 a0 u -> reconnaissance_co d0 a0 a0 u) -> (forall b : ad, prec_occur l b -> coacc d a b) -> preDTA_ref_ok d -> liste_reconnait_co d l a tl
rec_co_def_4 = fun (d : preDTA) (l : prec_list) (tl : term_list) => forall a : ad, preDTA_ref_ok d -> liste_reconnait d l tl -> (forall u : term, term_list_occur u tl -> forall (d0 : preDTA) (a0 : ad), preDTA_ref_ok d0 -> reconnaissance d0 a0 u -> reconnaissance_co d0 a0 a0 u) -> (forall b : ad, prec_occur l b -> coacc d a b) -> liste_reconnait_co d l a tl : preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list -> Prop

predta_coacc_0_fix : forall (d : preDTA) (a a0 : ad), preDTA_ref_ok d -> MapGet bool (predta_coacc_states_0 d a) a0 = Some true < -> coacc d a a0

mreconnaissance_co_ind : forall (P : forall (p : preDTA) (a a0 : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance_co p a a0 t -> Prop) (P0 : forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (a : ad) (t : term), state_reconnait_co p s a t -> Prop) (P1 : forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (a : ad) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait_co p p0 a t -> Prop), (forall (d : preDTA) (a b : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state) (e : MapGet state d a = Some ladj) (s : state_reconnait_co d ladj b t), P0 d ladj b t s -> forall c : coacc d b a, P d a b t (rec_co_dta d a b t ladj e s...
rec_co_def_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (a a1 : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance_co d a a1 t -> Prop
coacc_ind : forall P : preDTA -> ad -> ad -> Prop, (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (s : state), MapGet state d a = Some s -> P d a a) -> (forall (d : preDTA) (a0 a1 a2 : ad) (s1 s2 : state) (pl : prec_list) (c : ad), MapGet state d a2 = Some s2 -> MapGet state d a1 = Some s1 -> MapGet prec_list s1 c = Some pl -> prec_occur pl a2 -> coacc d a0 a1 -> P d a0 a1 -> P d a0 a2) -> forall (p : preDTA) (a a0 : ad), coacc p a a0 -> P p a a0
predta_coacc_contain_coacc_ads_3 : forall (d : preDTA) (a0 a1 : ad), coacc d a0 a1 -> preDTA_ref_ok d -> exists n : nat, MapGet bool (power (Map bool) (predta_coacc d a0) (map_mini state d) n) a1 = Some true
rec_nonco_kill_def_1 : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (a0 : ad) (t : term), state_reconnait_co d s a0 t -> Prop
rec_co_rec_def_1 : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (a0 : ad) (t : term), state_reconnait_co d s a0 t -> Prop
rec_co_dta : forall (d : preDTA) (a b : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait_co d ladj b t -> coacc d b a -> reconnaissance_co d a b t
mlrec_co_ind : forall (P : forall (p : preDTA) (a a0 : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance_co p a a0 t -> Prop) (P0 : forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (a : ad) (t : term), state_reconnait_co p s a t -> Prop) (P1 : forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (a : ad) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait_co p p0 a t -> Prop), (forall (d : preDTA) (a b : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state) (e : MapGet state d a = Some ladj) (s : state_reconnait_co d ladj b t), P0 d ladj b t s -> forall c : coacc d b a, P d a b t (rec_co_dta d a b t ladj e s c))...

predta_coacc_contain_coacc_ads_def_0 = fun (d : preDTA) (a0 a1 : ad) => coacc d a0 a1 -> preDTA_ref_ok d -> exists n : nat, MapGet bool (power (Map bool) (predta_coacc d a0) (map_mini state d) n) a1 = Some true : preDTA -> ad -> ad -> Prop
coacc_transitive : forall (d : preDTA) (a0 a1 a2 : ad), coacc d a0 a1 -> coacc d a1 a2 -> coacc d a0 a2
semantic_equiv_1 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance d a t -> rec_term d a t (essence t d) = true
Inductive coacc : preDTA -> ad -> ad -> Prop := coacc_id : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (s : state), MapGet state d a = Some s -> coacc d a a | coacc_nxt : forall (d : preDTA) (a0 a1 a2 : ad) (s1 s2 : state) (pl : prec_list) (c : ad), MapGet state d a2 = Some s2 -> MapGet state d a1 = Some s1 -> MapGet prec_list s1 c = Some pl -> prec_occur pl a2 -> coacc d a0 a1 -> coacc d a0 a2
reconnaissance_ind : forall P : preDTA -> ad -> term -> Prop, (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait d ladj t -> P d a t) -> forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> P p a t
Inductive reconnaissance_co : preDTA -> ad -> ad -> term -> Prop := rec_co_dta : forall (d : preDTA) (a b : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait_co d ladj b t -> coacc d b a -> reconnaissance_co d a b t with state_reconnait_co : preDTA -> state -> ad -> term -> Prop := rec_co_st : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c b : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait_co d l b tl -> state_reconnait_co d s b (app c tl) with liste_reconnait_co : preDTA -> prec_list -> ad -> term_list ->...-> liste_reconnait_co d (prec_cons a la ls) b (tcons hd tl)
